scripts.build-js: cd client && browserify -t brfs --debug -e test/test.js -o ../server/public/scripts/bundle.js; cd ../
scripts.build: npm run build-js & npm run build-css
scripts.watch-js: cd client && watchify -t brfs --debug -e test/test.js -o ../server/public/scripts/bundle.js; cd ../
scripts.watch: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css
scripts.start: npm run build && nodemon --watch server --ignore 'public/' server/server.js
